creator: james.fuller.2007@gmail.com
text: building ant on RHES4, the latest version of jsch is now a dependency
*** Bug 40332 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: james.fuller.2007@gmail.com
peterreilly@apache.org
text: What needs to be changed or updated?

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text:
Hmm... we already don't refer to a version in install.html#librarydependencies .
 It's kind of nice that way, but I guess the user should be able to figure out
what version he needs by reading that page...

creator: ymnk@jcraft.com
text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> What needs to be changed or updated?

Since Ant 1.7Beta, scp task will use sftp protocol internally in
some configuration and jsch's API for sftp has slightly modified at 0.1.21.
That is the reason.
I have fixed some bugs related to sftp support in recent jsch versions,
0.1.28 and 0.1.29.  So, in conclusion, I recommend to use the latest jsch
version, 0.1.29.

Thanks Jim for reporting the bug and Atsuhiko for letting us know which versions
of jsch work and Peter and Matt for adding comments.
creator: antoine@apache.org
